Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th/Dan Ryan due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th/Dan Ryan due to an injured customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • #29 State
  • #30 South Chicago
  • #67 67th/69th/71st 
  • #71 71st/South Shore 

Also, as a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Garfield to 95th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
